è¿™äº›è°œé¢˜æ˜¯æå¥½çš„å¤§è„‘è®­ç»ƒã€‚ ğŸ¤¯

ä»Šå¤©ä½ çš„å¤§è„‘è¿è½¬å¾—æ€ä¹ˆæ ·ï¼Ÿ ğŸ§ 

å¯¹è¯æœ‰å¤§çº¦ 26 ç§ä¸åŒè¯­è¨€çš„å­—å¹•ã€‚

ç©å¾—å¼€å¿ƒã€‚

è‹±æ–‡ç¿»è¯‘ï¼š

Puzzling Wild introduces this IQ Test of logic and visual reasoning. There are no instructions. You are shown some examples and have to find the patterns. These IQ Tests were developed by a Professor to try to test the intelligence of AI robots. Are you smarter than a robot? Can you solve all 400 by your self?

The puzzles are introduced by our good friends Ginger the Giraffe, and Hugo Hippo. The most famous animal podcasters.

As you solve more puzzles, you unlock more podcast conversations between Ginger and Hugo.

We estimate your IQ by comparing your score to the everyone else's score using custom algorithms.

These puzzles are excellent brain training. ğŸ¤¯

How well is your brain working today? ğŸ§ 

There are subtitles for the conversations in about 26 different languages.

Have fun.
